mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (userid, passwd, username, phone1, phone2, phone3, email1, email2, uploadfilename, storefilename) VALUES (#{userid},#{passwd},#{username},#{phone1},#{phone2},#{phone3},#{email1},#{email2},#{uploadFileName},#{storeFileName})
mapper.update: update MEMBER set username=#{username}, userid=#{userid}, passwd=#{passwd}, email1=#{email1}, email2=#{email2}, authorities=#{authorities}, image=#{image}, image_db=#{image_db}, phone1=#{phone1}, phone1=#{phone2}, phone1=#{phone3} where m_idx=#{m_idx}
